ruling: - Your Graveyard only has to be empty when you activate [[Dimension Distortion]], so if an effect is chained that puts a card in your Graveyard, [[Dimension Distortion]] still resolves.

- [[Dimension Distortion]] can only Special Summon a monster that is face-up while removed from play (it cannot Special Summon a monster removed with [[Lightforce Sword]] or [[Different Dimension Capsule]]).
- [[Dimension Distortion]] can Special Summon [[Dark Ruler Ha Des]].
- When a Special Summon-only monster is removed, without returning to the hand or Deck, after it was Special Summoned properly, it can be Special Summoned by [[Dimension Distortion]].
